overview_summary: The neighboring landowners include two private living trusts and one local business. Both the Decker and Nye trusts represent individual landowners with no public organizational ties or evident community roles. The third neighbor, R V City, Inc., is a long-established RV dealership in Huachuca City, suggesting moderate local presence but no clear stance on development. None of these entities appear to be major organized opposition or development proponents, though the business could have economic interests aligning with local growth.

neighbors.name: Decker Roy F Living Trust
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner trust with no known broader community influence or leadership.

neighbors.name: R V City Inc
neighbors.claims: R V City, Inc. was incorporated in Arizona on August 3, 1987, and has operated in Cochise County for over three decades [Better Business Bureau](https://www.bbb.org/us/az/huachuca-city/profile/rv-dealers/rv-city-inc-1286-16902). The company specializes in recreational vehicle sales and is located at 2095 N Highway 90 in Huachuca City, AZ [Names and Numbers](https://www.namesandnumbers.com/biz/39806/rv-city). It is led by Mr. Ronald Hoffman, who serves as the President of R V City, Inc. [Better Business Bureau](https://www.bbb.org/us/az/huachuca-city/profile/rv-dealers/rv-city-inc-1286-16902).
neighbors.influence_justification: Established local business (over 35 years in operation); well-known in the area but not involved in public office or major civic leadership.

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate dialogue with President Ronald Hoffman and highlight how the proposed development could boost local commerce, aligning with the dealership’s interests. Emphasize shared goals of regional growth and address any concerns to secure neutral or positive engagement.

neighbors.name: Nye James W Revocable Living Trust Agreement
neighbors.influence_justification: Individual’s revocable trust with no public profile; influence likely limited to personal property interests.
